document.full_text: an iraqi man has been arrested in kentucky on charges that he helped plot and carry out attacks on american troops after the u.s. invasion in 2003, the justice department said on tuesday.
document.title: iraqi arrested in kentucky for u.s. troop attacks
lines_and_colors: an iraqi man has been arrested in kentucky on charges that he helped plot and carry out attacks on american troops after the u.s. invasion in 2003, the justice department said on tuesday.
